memberdef.argsstring: (BSPNode *pLeft, BSPNode *pRight, bool isHorizontal, const BW::Rect &range, float position)
memberdef.name: InternalNode

detaileddescription.para: Constructor.
Constructor used while recovering cell data.
Destructor.
This method adds a new cell to this subtree.
This method adds a cell to a subtree by splitting the given cell.

simplesect.para: The new subtree if pCellToSplit is in this subtree, otherwise NULL.

detaileddescription.para: This method is used to remove a cell from the tree.
This method is used to implement the Visitor pattern.
This method returns the cell at the input point.
This method updates the load associated with nodes in this sub-tree.
This method returns the average load of cells that are children of this node.
This method returns the average smoothed load of cells that are children of this node.
This method returns the total smoothed load of cells that are children of this node.
This method is used to balance the load between the cells.
This method updates this and the child ranges.
This method adds this subtree to the input stream.
This method is used to dump debug information about the BSP tree.

memberdef.argsstring: (bool changeY, bool changeMax, bool moveLeft) const
memberdef.name: calculateNewAreaNotLoaded

detaileddescription.para: This method calculates the required area that would not be loaded if the node's range where changed. This is used when "load balancing" based on the number of unloaded chunks.

parameterdescription.para: If true, a horizontal boundary is changed.
If true, the maximum boundary is changed.
If true, the boundary is increased, otherwise decreased.

detaileddescription.para: This static method skips over the data for an InternalNode in the stream.
Private default constructor only used by skipDataInStream().
This is used by all constructors to initialise the data.
This method sets the members of this class (non-recursively) from streamed recovery data.
This method adjusts the balance aggression. If the balance direction changes, the balance aggression is reduced.
This method returns the direction to balance based on unloaded chunks.
This method balances the children.
This method does that actual work of balancing.
This method snaps the partition point to the nearest space boundary.

simplesect.para: The direction of movement. BALANCE_NONE if it is currently within the boundary.

detaileddescription.para: This method returns the limit of movement based on the entity bounds in the direction of movement.
This method returns the limit of movement based on the entity bounds in the direction of movement.
This method calculates the range of the child nodes.
This method is a helper that attempts to add a new cell to a subtree if the subtree contains the indicated cell.

parameterdescription.para: The child subtree to attempt adding. If successful, the child tree pointer is updated to the new subtree.
The new cell to be added.
The cell that should be split.

simplesect.para: True if the new cell was added to the child subtree otherwise false.

detaileddescription.para: This method returns a balance direction given left minus right loads.

memberdef.argsstring: (float position, float limit1, float limit2, BalanceDirection direction)
memberdef.name: closestLimit

detaileddescription.para: This helper method returns the limit to move to based on the direction of movment.
This class is used for internal nodes of the BSP tree. They represent a partitioning line between cells. The leaves are the cells of a space.
